page.title: 11COPWOOD FARM.
page.content:
{Mr Tebbitt},the owner of{Copwood {Farm}has sent us an interesting letter.Here is the part that explains how the new road scheme is affecting him.
"It sounds terrible to say this but I have completely ceased farming for a year while the{by-pass}road, round about and link road are pushed through Copwood. There are no animals except a couple of horses on the farm, and no crops except grass until everything settles down again. My replies to your questionnaire would at the moment be completely different to what normally happens on a normal farm."
Mr Tebbitt has been in America for some of this time. He ia obviously looking forward to getting back to normal.
